Reviews.Title: Granny Loves Her New Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Pete "Collector of films and books that enhan...
Reviews.Content: For starters, I purchased this camera for my sweet old grandmother who was looking to step into the world of digital cameras. She's always asking for pictures of the family whenever there are get-togethers. For her, this camera has been very easy to use, just point and shoot. She has it set in the iA setting and the shots come out great. She hasn't used the video mode just yet, but I'm teaching her how to switch the settings over to it. I'm overall pleased with this camera and as long as granny is happy, that's all that counts.The zoom is only 4x but for the purpose that I bought it for, it's enough. Great to put in your pocket or purse and take it out quickly when you need it. It's fairly light, not heavy at all. The rechargeable battery it comes with is another plus. As long as you know you're purchasing this without the expectations of those more expensive cameras with 10 to 35x zooms on them, you can't go wrong with this everywhere, everyday kind of camera from Panasonic. Also, getting a small carrying case for it is highly recommended like this one here from Case Logic TBC-302 Ultra Compact Camera Case with Storage (Black) Don't forget the SD Card too.

Reviews.Title: Reasonable price, good gift
Reviews.Author: DAG
Reviews.Content: Bought it as a gift and it was a pretty good hit. The digital "Intelligent Zoom" gets you to 8x zoom. There is a quick auto-focus and an "Intelligent Auto" setting where the camera can choose the optimal settings. Also equipped with a panoramic setting to get wide or tall shots. Not really a camera to get and use for all your prized photos, but it's a good gift with some bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: I can't believe the quality
Reviews.Author: R. Holmes
Reviews.Content: This camera was everything I hoped for and more. The picture quality is superb in all modes. Don't forget the the "case logic" case witch fits perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Brenda C
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Panasonic camera, 2nd of the exact same model, my other one was stolen along with my purse. I love the quality of this camera. I have tried many different cameras in my life and I just love the way my photos come out with this specific model. It is easy to use, no crazy features. I highly recommend! great price too!

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, works great have had no issues at all. We use an amazon sd card with this and every works flawless.

Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures.
Reviews.Author: GoDawgs82
Reviews.Content: Good value, good camera. Panasonic is known for quality camera equipment. Nice 4 x zoom and crisp pictures with nice colors.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a first camera
Reviews.Author: KristiR
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera as a Christmas present for our 9 year old. After a bunch of research this camera had everything and more (including video) and was way cheaper than anything else! It's super easy to use and takes great pics!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: D. Rhea "BBSFiles"
Reviews.Content: Needed a set of cameras to use at convention to allow people to take photos and upload to a website on the fly. Actually bought the Eye-Fi memory cards first and found the "cheapest" name brand camera I could to work with them. These fit the bill perfectly !

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Nancy L Doornbos
Reviews.Content: This camera is a good deal for the price.  The colors could be brighter and the zoom pictures are funky, but it is adequate for everyday picture taking. It is small and lightweight and I actually carry it in my purse.

Reviews.Title: Poor picture focus
Reviews.Author: The Confluence "Lord Jim II"
Reviews.Content: I have tried many pictures and they all appear to be slightly out of focus, i.e. they are not clear.  I have previously owned a 5Mb camera which created much clearer photos.  I wish to return this camera, probably just a lemon.Followup:  I did return the first camera which Amazon did with speedy exchange at no cost including free shipping, but the second camera is still disappointing with the clarity of the photos. I was using the automatic focusing feature which is supposed to make things simple for a camera dork like me. Went directly via phone to the manufacturer and after about a half hour with trying several attempts of a fix, nothing seemed to solve the problem.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix S2 14.1MP
Reviews.Author: GK in QH
Reviews.Content: There's a lot to like about this camera.  I backpack and needed a lightweight, easy to use camera.  Twice the mp's of the old HP; sharp pictures.  Love the crisp clarity of the videos with my voice nice sound.  Only disappointment is cannot zoom in while taking video like the old HP could.

Reviews.Title: okay camera
Reviews.Author: S. quan
Reviews.Content: nice pocket camera.  very nice panorama option, although it works only at wide angle.  Noticed a lens flare at bright direct sunlight.this camera has face detection that works well.  i don't like the cute menu.

Reviews.Title: get what you paid for
Reviews.Author: S. Jacob "stj60659"
Reviews.Content: Reasonable and practical camera for many uses.Need to remember I only paid $75 for it. Certainly cannot compare to camera equipment worth 20 times as much, or people who just take bad photos.

Reviews.Title: Bastante Buena
Reviews.Author: Oscar Leiton Solis "Chuva"
Reviews.Content: Bastante buena si lo que deseas es una cámara que puedas usar en momentos familiares, o andarla siempre a mano.La calidad de las fotos es buena, aunque en algunas ocasiones podría ser mejor, todo depende de la cantidad de Luz.El estabilizador Digital funciona perfectamente.Respecto a los vídeos, creo que la única falla es no poder utilizar el acercamiento mientras lo grabas,...incluso, si empiezas a grabar con un zoom de 3x, así debes terminar el vídeo.

Reviews.Title: Not very good
Reviews.Author: Iveyleigh32
Reviews.Content: The camera takes blurry images if there is any movement at all. I put a 8gb sd card in it and it told me I could only take 700 photos or 8 minutes of video. Don't buy!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: excelente valor-precio
Reviews.Author: MIGUEL AMUNDARAY
Reviews.Content: muy buena camara.. liviana y estilizada.. gran calidad de imagen y de facil manejo.. definitivamente una gran camara por un excelente precio..

ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix S2 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom (Black)
